positions.title: Software Developer
positions.info: Implement unit and integration testing. Develop visualization from large data sets spanning many tables. Work cross-functionally with customer operations to create/update dashboards based on changes in the business context.
positions.tools: React, JavaScript, Django, Python, d3.js, PostgreSQL

positions.title: iOS Developer
positions.company: Mobile Application Development Lab University of Toronto
positions.info: Develop and maintain U of T applications and collaborative projects. Facilitate social events and workshops on app development. Assist with outreach to students, faculty and staff.

positions.title: Programming Teacher
positions.info: Deliver instructional programs designed to support individual student needs. Maintain regular communication with parents and update the progress of students. Provide exercises and assignment help.
